row1.info: FlatBox is a 100% machine washable neoprene lunch box. It's quick and easy to clean - just pop it in the washing machine and hang to dry. More traditional lunch boxes cannot be cleaned properly, which can cause an accumulation of hazardous bacteria. Cleaning your FlatBox frequently will eliminate 99.99% of germs, bacteria, and curb the build-up of food allergens.

Washing your FlatBox kills bacteria that may be hiding on desktops and tables, which can lead to foodborne illness. FlatBox turns into a placemat for a germ-free surface to eat lunch anywhere you go. Made from neoprene, FlatBox is 100% machine washable to prevent germs and bacteria from clinging to your food.

FlatBox is the perfect lunch box for kids with allergies, since it converts into a flat placemat to prevent cross contact.
